titles.title: World Fool News Part II
ワールドフールニュース PART II
World Fool News Part II

anime.description: All sorts of things that happen all the time (?!) in the day-to-day dealings of a local TV station. Life has been relatively peaceful (?!) for the staff of World Fool News since the addition of the new newscaster, http://anidb.net/ch88576 [Takahashi Ichitarou]. But now, a new crisis is upon them... Source: crunchyroll

externalentity.identifier: ワールドフールニュース

episode.title: 狙われた下平さん!?
They`re After Shimohira-san!?
Nerawareta Shimohira-san!?
episode.summary: The Fools are back at World Fool News. The show undergoes a "renewal" that`s too small for its own cast members to notice. An african prince goes bungie-jumping. Dark forces plot against Shimohara. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 忍び寄る影!?
A Shadow Approaches!?
Shinobiyoru Kage!?
episode.summary: It`s another night on the World Fool News program, as the newscasters bring you the zaniest stories from around Japan. This time, a dolphin baby is born at a snake zoo, a Haniwa lookalike contest is won by an actual Haniwa, and a food researcher and an education pundit have a spirited debate about cucumbers. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: グルメレポート大作戦!?
The Great Food Reporting Plan!?
Gourmet Report Daisakusen!?
episode.summary: Maruyama has been sent to interview a legendarily difficult ramen chef. And to make matters worse, the chef is a friend of the company`s managing director, so if he screws up, he`s in big trouble! But the ditzy Kanae is too airheaded to do her own reporting, and he has to feed her her lines. Then the equipment breaks, and she starts mishearing his words... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スーパー赤ちゃん, 仕事の流儀!?
Super Baby`s Work Style!?
Super Akachan, Shigoto no Ryuugi!?
episode.summary: It`s a special episode on World Fool News today as they cover "Super Baby", a boy who`s less than one year old but who also runs one of the biggest construction companies in the prefecture. Follow along with super baby to learn his take on life, and find out how he keeps healthy doing business dinners before he`s been weaned off of breast milk. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 美貴ちゃんのもう一つの顔!?
Another Side of Miki-chan!?
Miki-chan no Mouhitotsu no Kao!?
episode.summary: Miki-chan comes in one morning without her glasses, and she`s a whole different person! She starts to take over the show, but Usui-chan is too taken by her charms to stop her... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: すき焼きとジョナサン!?
Sukiyaki and Jonathan!?
Sukiyaki to Jonathan!?
episode.summary: Shimohara is appearing on a girl talk show, where they eat sukiyaki as they talk! As she stares at the sukiyaki, she remembers the strange and fantastic events that have taken place so far. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 古代の国からこんにちは!?
Hello from Ancient Times!?
Kodai no Kuni kara Konnichiwa!?
episode.summary: It`s time to head back into ancient times, because this episode of World Fool News takes the crew back to old Japan! Enjoy the latest news from over a thousand years ago, and see some familiar faces transported to new (or old!) situations! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 薄井さん犬の手を借りる日!?
Usui-san Turns To a Dog for Help!?
Usui-san Inu no Te o Kariru Hi!?
episode.summary: The whole staff is out with a cold! Usui is forced to run an entire news program by himself, with a half-conscious Maruyama offering what support he can. And when people start passing out during the program, Usui is forced to turn to an even more unlikely source for help... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: それぞれの選択!?
The Choices They Make!?
Sorezore no Sentaku!?
episode.summary: Without Kanae, World Fool News is a shadow of its former self. Will she really leave them to go to Tokyo? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 旅立ちの季節!?
The Season of New Journeys!?
Tabidachi no Kisetsu!?
episode.summary: Kanae might be leaving! The whole crew is depressed after hearing that Kanae recieved an offer to leave Central TV and go to Tokyo. Takahashi is especially glum... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あの日のホタルを探して!?
Searching for the Fireflies from That Day!?
Ano Hi no Hotaru o Sagashite!?
episode.summary: The whole crew goes location hunting for a report on fireflies. Takahashi and Kanae share a beautiful moment together as they watch the fireflies. But the snapping man has an offer for Kanae... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 台風のあと!?
After the Typhoon!?
Taifuu no Ato!?
episode.summary: A typhoon has come, and the weather girl`s been blown away! But the show must go on, and this week, World Fool News has some special commentators... Source: crunchyroll
